name: smooth-polyline
description: Smoothing algorithm for 2D lines and polygons

scripts.patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m 'update version' && git push origin master && bower version patch && git push origin master --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m 'update version' && git push origin master && bower version minor && git push origin master --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m 'update version' && git push origin master && bower version major && git push origin master --follow-tags && npm publish

author: Igor Ognichenko <ognichenko.igor@gmail.com>
